tool_description:
An API giving live weather reports around the world

I wanted to let you know that the current API is not available for POST requests. It is only available for GET requests at the moment, which means that you will not be able to modify or create any resources using the API.

However, there are several benefits of using the GET method for retrieving data from the API, including:

Caching: GET requests can be cached by the client, which can improve the performance of the application by reducing...
name: Weather Report Live
title: Weather Report Live

api_list.name: GET the weather information for your desired location
api_list.description: The GET method is a way to request weather information from a weather API by specifying the location you want to know the weather for in the URL. The weather API will then send the weather data back to you in a format like JSON that you can use in your application. You may need to include additional information like an API key or parameters to customize the data you receive. Once you get the data, you can use it to display the weather to your users or store it for further use in your application.
